source:
<!--
  ## Introduction

  Use the [`amp-hulu`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-hulu-v0.1.md) component to embed Hulu videos into AMP files.
--><!-- -->
<!doctype html>
<html ⚡>
<head>
<meta charset="utf-8">
  <title>amp-hulu</title>
  <link rel="canonical" href="http://localhost:8080/documentation/examples/components/amp-hulu/index.html">
  <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width,minimum-scale=1,initial-scale=1">
  <script async src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0.js"></script>
  <!-- ## Setup -->
  <!--
  Import the `amp-hulu` component in the header.
  -->
  <script async custom-element="amp-hulu" src="https://cdn.ampproject.org/v0/amp-hulu-0.1.js"></script>
  <style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-moz-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;-ms-animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both;animation:-amp-start 8s steps(1,end) 0s 1 normal both}@-webkit-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-moz-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-ms-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@-o-keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}@keyframes -amp-start{from{visibility:hidden}to{visibility:visible}}</style><noscript><style amp-boilerplate>body{-webkit-animation:none;-moz-animation:none;-ms-animation:none;animation:none}</style></noscript>
</head>
<body>

  <!-- ## Basic usage -->
  <!--
  Embed Hulu videos via the `eid` in a video's URL. We recommend using the responsive layout for videos.

  [tip type="note"]
  This sample only works on mobile browsers due to restrictions from Hulu and the component can only be used by Hulu partners.
  [/tip]

  -->
  <amp-hulu width="412" height="213" layout="responsive" data-eid="4Dk5F2PYTtrgciuvloH3UA">
  </amp-hulu>
</body></html>

sections.doc_:
## Introduction

Use the [`amp-hulu`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-hulu-v0.1.md) component to embed Hulu videos into AMP files.
sections.cachedMarkedDoc:
Introduction

Use the amp-hulu component to embed Hulu videos into AMP files.
sections.normalizedDoc_:
## Introduction

Use the [`amp-hulu`](/content/amp-dev/documentation/components/reference/amp-hulu-v0.1.md) component to embed Hulu videos into AMP files.

sections.doc_: Import the `amp-hulu` component in the header.
sections.normalizedDoc_: Import the `amp-hulu` component in the header.

</head>
<body>

sections.doc_:
Embed Hulu videos via the `eid` in a video's URL. We recommend using the responsive layout for videos.

[tip type="note"]
This sample only works on mobile browsers due to restrictions from Hulu and the component can only be used by Hulu partners.
[/tip]

Embed Hulu videos via the `eid` in a video's URL. We recommend using the responsive layout for videos.

[tip type="note"]
This sample only works on mobile browsers due to restrictions from Hulu and the component can only be used by Hulu partners.
[/tip]
